data.name: Enclave Rainmaker
data.description: Surprisingly popular sidearm in the Enclave, to the point that long service in the military is awarded with an engraved variant of the Rainmaker. The gun packs a surprising punch for its weight.
data.notes: Can fire multiple shots in a single action, dealing additional +(1) damage per additional "ammo" used. Up to +(3) damage to the attack for firing the entire capacity at once. The next attack using this weapon after using this feature suffers a -10 to MEWs.
